title: Alternator Regulator/Rectifier - Removal

body.body: The alternator regulator/rectifier is attached to the front of the lower yoke. The regulator/rectifier does not contain any serviceable parts and must be replaced if faulty.
Seat and Battery - remove - D72; D92; DB; DB2; DBX; DC3; DC4; DP; DP2; DP3; DP4; DPA; DT3; DU; DU3; DUY; DZ
Disconnect the battery, negative (black) lead first (see

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: D54; D64; DC3; DC4; DP4; D72; D92; DB2; DU3; DT3; DP3; DP2; DZ; DBX; DB; DUY; DU; DPA; DP

body.body: Note the position of the electrical connectors for installation.
If fitted, note the position of the regulator/rectifier moulding(s) and spacer for installation.
Release and discard the two fixings securing the regulator/rectifier to the lower yoke. Detach the regulator/rectifier and, if fitted, remove the moulding(s).
Disconnect both electrical connectors and remove the regulator/rectifier.

metadata.products: DU3; DT3; DP2; DC; DPA; DBX; DB; DUY; DU; DP
